summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.0°C) and outside temperature (down 2.4°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 5%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 456 m) and light levels (up 4792 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1389 m), light levels (up 7083 lux), feels like temperature (up 3.9°C), and outside temperature (up 3.2°C) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 455.6m lower than yesterday, 1014.2m lower than past week, 1389.1m lower than past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 860m and a peak of 3110m, averaging 1417.8m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Possible light showers, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and bright intervals likely. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
